bioconda.name: bioconductor-ichip
bioconda.summary: Bayesian Modeling of ChIP-chip Data Through Hidden Ising Models

biotools.summary: This package uses hidden Ising models to identify enriched genomic regions in ChIP-chip data.  It can be used to analyze the data from multiple platforms (e.g., Affymetrix, Agilent, and NimbleGen), and the data with single to multiple replicates.

bioschemas.name: iChip
bioschemas.summary: This package uses hidden Ising models to identify enriched genomic regions in ChIP-chip data.  It can be used to analyze the data from multiple platforms (e.g., Affymetrix, Agilent, and NimbleGen), and the data with single to multiple replicates.
